short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin aims to help reach your water intake by limiting often visited sites until you have reached yrou goal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you set the amount of glasses of water you want to drink everyday and you set often visted sites. It will block access to the sites until you have reached  at least half your goal for the day.
